entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@realDonaldTrump Quick science lesson for the occupant of the White House:

- Antibiotics fight bacterial infections.
- The novel Coronavirus is a virus.

Truly, the only protection against the current virus destroying our country is to vote him out.

DUMP TRUMP IN NOVEMBER

STAY SAFE and WELL
